title: Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro renders leak
description: Honor launched the 400 Lite earlier this month, and it is due to be soon joined by the 400 and 400 Pro. Today renders for both of these have been leaked, and you can see them below. The Honor 400 Pro has a 200 MP main camera as part of a triple camera setup and smaller bezels. The Honor 400 has just two rear cameras. It's unclear what the official names are for any of these colorways, by the way. Honor 400 Pro leaked renders Both models have flat screens, and the Pro has either dual front-facing cameras or one selfie snapper and an IR camera for face unlock. According to...
excerpt: The former has a dual rear camera setup, the latter adds an extra camera. Honor launched the 400 Lite earlier this month, and it is due to be soon joined...
text: Honor launched the 400 Lite earlier this month, and it is due to be soon joined by the 400 and 400 Pro. Today renders for both of these have been leaked, and you can see them below. The Honor 400 Pro has a 200 MP main camera as part of a triple camera setup and smaller bezels. The Honor 400 has just two rear cameras. It's unclear what the official names are for any of these colorways, by the way. Honor 400 Pro leaked renders Both models have flat screens, and the Pro has either dual front-facing cameras or one selfie snapper and an IR camera for face unlock. According to previous rumors, the Honor 400 will be powered by the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, while the Pro will go with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. Honor 400 leaked renders The Honor 400 allegedly has a 6.55-inch OLED screen and the Honor 400 Pro a 6.69-inch OLED panel. Both of those should have "1.5K" resolution, and both are marginally smaller than their predecessors'. Finally, expect 7,000 mAh or larger batteries. Honor 400 Lite 256GB 8GB RAM£ 249.99 Source
html:
Honor launched the 400 Lite earlier this month, and it is due to be soon joined by the 400 and 400 Pro. Today renders for both of these have been leaked, and you can see them below.

The Honor 400 Pro has a 200 MP main camera as part of a triple camera setup and smaller bezels. The Honor 400 has just two rear cameras. It's unclear what the official names are for any of these colorways, by the way.


Honor 400 Pro leaked renders

Both models have flat screens, and the Pro has either dual front-facing cameras or one selfie snapper and an IR camera for face unlock. According to previous rumors, the Honor 400 will be powered by the Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, while the Pro will go with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3.


Honor 400 leaked renders

The Honor 400 allegedly has a 6.55-inch OLED screen and the Honor 400 Pro a 6.69-inch OLED panel. Both of those should have "1.5K" resolution, and both are marginally smaller than their predecessors'. Finally, expect 7,000 mAh or larger batteries.

Honor 400 Lite

  • 256GB 8GB RAM£ 249.99

Source
